name: HoverChase!
description:
simple shooter I made about a cop with a hoverboard chasing his evil doppelgänger in a ball.

Game made for the TriJam Jam!!!! I'm really proud of this even though I only had like 3 hours to do it 

Tip: Don't hit the animals.

--------------------------
Controls:

WASD - Move

K - Shoot

---------------------------
